## Block.unplug() method

Unplug this block from its superior block. If this block is a statement, optionally reconnect the block underneath with the block on top.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unplug(opt_healStack?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

opt\_healStack


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Disconnect child statement and reconnect stack. Defaults to false.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
